issue.title: [CF 1488] Tracking Ember of nullification
issue.body:
Hey, i can’t find a way to track the internal cooldown of the trinket : ember of nullification. Am i missing something or is it not possible ? And if so, well i’ll submit it as enhancement.


> Posted by CurseForge user Half_Bear67457 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1488 | Raw

comments.body:
What did you try?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
